event.description: Kyle Schwarber walks.
Kris Bryant flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Anthony Rizzo flies out to left fielder Randal Grichuk.
Addison Russell pops out to third baseman Jhonny Peralta.
Willson Contreras called out on strikes.
Jason Heyward grounds out softly, second baseman Kolten Wong to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Javier Baez strikes out swinging.
Jake Arrieta singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Randal Grichuk.
Albert Almora grounds into a force out, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to second baseman Kolten Wong. Jake Arrieta out at 2nd. Albert Almora to 1st.
Kyle Schwarber flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Kris Bryant flies out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Anthony Rizzo flies out to right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Addison Russell doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Willson Contreras walks.
Jason Heyward singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Randal Grichuk. Addison Russell scores. Willson Contreras to 3rd.
Javier Baez hits a sacrifice bunt. Willson Contreras scores. Jason Heyward to 2nd. Javier Baez to 1st.
With Jake Arrieta batting, wild pitch by Adam Wainwright, Jason Heyward to 3rd. Javier Baez to 2nd.
Jake Arrieta strikes out swinging.
Albert Almora strikes out swinging.
Kyle Schwarber called out on strikes.
Kris Bryant called out on strikes.
Anthony Rizzo grounds out sharply, first baseman Matt Carpenter to pitcher Adam Wainwright.
Pitching Change: Matt Bowman replaces Adam Wainwright, batting 6th, replacing right fielder Stephen Piscotty.
Defensive switch from left field to right field for Randal Grichuk.
Matt Adams remains in the game as the left fielder.
Addison Russell flies out to left fielder Matt Adams.
Willson Contreras strikes out swinging.
Jason Heyward flies out to left fielder Matt Adams.
Pitching Change: Brett Cecil replaces Matt Bowman, batting 6th, replacing Greg Garcia.
Javier Baez strikes out swinging.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Szczur replaces Jake Arrieta.
Matt Szczur pops out to catcher Yadier Molina in foul territory.
Albert Almora singles on a ground ball to right fielder Randal Grichuk.
Kyle Schwarber flies out to left fielder Matt Adams.
Pitching Change: Kevin Siegrist replaces Brett Cecil, batting 6th.
Kris Bryant pops out to second baseman Kolten Wong in foul territory.
Anthony Rizzo hit by pitch.
Addison Russell pops out to second baseman Kolten Wong.
Willson Contreras singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Adams. Anthony Rizzo to 2nd.
Jason Heyward grounds out, second baseman Kolten Wong to first baseman Matt Carpenter.
Pitching Change: Jonathan Broxton replaces Kevin Siegrist, batting 6th.
Javier Baez lines out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ben Zobrist replaces Pedro Strop.
Ben Zobrist walks.
Albert Almora out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to first baseman Matt Carpenter. Ben Zobrist to 2nd.
Jonathan Broxton intentionally walks Kyle Schwarber.
Kris Bryant grounds into a force out, third baseman Jhonny Peralta to second baseman Kolten Wong. Kyle Schwarber out at 2nd.
Dexter Fowler called out on strikes.
Aledmys Diaz lines out to shortstop Addison Russell.
Matt Carpenter strikes out swinging.
Jhonny Peralta strikes out swinging.
Yadier Molina grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Stephen Piscotty strikes out swinging.
Randal Grichuk strikes out swinging, catcher Willson Contreras to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Kolten Wong grounds out sharply, second baseman Javier Baez to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Adam Wainwright grounds out softly, pitcher Jake Arrieta to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Dexter Fowler singles on a fly ball to left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Aledmys Diaz grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Dexter Fowler to 2nd.
Matt Carpenter grounds out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo. Dexter Fowler to 3rd.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Yadier Molina pops out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Stephen Piscotty hit by pitch.
Randal Grichuk flies out to center fielder Albert Almora.
With Kolten Wong batting, wild pitch by Jake Arrieta, Stephen Piscotty to 2nd.

Kolten Wong singles on a soft ground ball to second baseman Javier Baez. Stephen Piscotty scores. Kolten Wong to 2nd. Missed catch error by second baseman Javier Baez. Throwing error by second baseman Javier Baez.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Matt Adams replaces Adam Wainwright.
Matt Adams walks.
Dexter Fowler strikes out swinging.
Aledmys Diaz grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Matt Carpenter lines out sharply to right fielder Jason Heyward.
Jhonny Peralta singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Albert Almora, deflected by second baseman Javier Baez.
Yadier Molina singles on a ground ball to center fielder Albert Almora. Jhonny Peralta to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Greg Garcia replaces Matt Bowman.
St. Louis Cardinals right fielder Stephen Piscotty left the game due to an injured head.
With Greg Garcia batting, wild pitch by Jake Arrieta, Jhonny Peralta to 3rd. Yadier Molina to 2nd.
Greg Garcia walks.
Randal Grichuk pops out to shortstop Addison Russell.
Pitching Change: Koji Uehara replaces Jake Arrieta, batting 8th, replacing Matt Szczur.
Kolten Wong pops out to second baseman Javier Baez.
Matt Adams flies out sharply to center fielder Albert Almora.
Dexter Fowler strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Pedro Strop replaces Koji Uehara, batting 8th.
Aledmys Diaz flies out to left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Matt Carpenter strikes out swinging.
Jhonny Peralta grounds out, third baseman Kris Bryant to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Pitching Change: Wade Davis replaces Pedro Strop, batting 1st, replacing left fielder Kyle Schwarber.
Ben Zobrist remains in the game as the left fielder.
Yadier Molina lines out to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Jose Martinez replaces Jonathan Broxton.
Jose Martinez walks.
Randal Grichuk grounds into a force out, third baseman Kris Bryant to second baseman Javier Baez. Jose Martinez out at 2nd. Randal Grichuk to 1st.
Cardinals challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Kolten Wong grounds out, second baseman Javier Baez to first baseman Anthony Rizzo.
